description:
In the past year, we have seen a remarkable number of breakthroughs in the field of natural language processing, including huge leaps forward in classifying, generating, and translating text. I will share a survey of the field, how it is changing, and what you need to know to get involved.

See the full SciPy 2019 playlist at https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYx7XA2nY5GcDQblpQ_M1V3PQPoLWiDAC
Connect with us!

title: The New Era in NLP
